attributes.action: Ban or create stricter regulations on the use of Articulated(bendy) buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
bendy buses cause 75% more accidents than regular double decker buses.

These buses should be banned or in the very least restricted from areas with a high incidence of accidents involving bendy buses.

If there is "NOT ENOUIGH INFORMATION REGARDING ACCIDENTS WITH BENDY BUSES DUE TO **not something to do with the government** then research shouild be carried out and data collected.

rejection.details:
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
We cannot accept petitions containing links to other websites.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
